TEXT.French: Can only be built near the Equator

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]城市训练的单位免费获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]晋升
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市训练的单位免费获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]晋升
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s1_Name[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT] Promotion for Units Built in this City

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]为所在大陆的所有城市提供电力([ICON_POWER])
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]为所在大陆的所有城市提供电力([ICON_POWER])
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Provides Power ([ICON_POWER]) for All Cities on this Continent

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市新建单位经验点数%D1_Change
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市新建单位经验点数%D1_Change
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]New Units Receive %D1_Change Experience Points in All Cities

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]同一大陆所有城市获得%D1_Change位免费专业人员
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]同一大陆所有城市获得%D1_Change位免费专业人员
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change Free Specialists in All Cities on this Continent

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市获得%D1_Change位免费专业人员
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市获得%D1_Change位免费专业人员

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HealthOrUn in All Cities on this Continent
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn in All Cities on this Continent

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市飞船组件建造速度%D1_Mod%%
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市飞船组件建造速度%D1_Mod%%

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change Trade Routes in All Coastal Cities

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]如选择%s1_EraName或更晚时代作为游戏初始时代可免费获得
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]如选择%s1_EraName或更晚时代作为游戏初始时代可免费获得
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Available for free on %s1_EraName and later starts

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]需要一个经验等级为%d1_Num的单位[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]需要一个经验等级为%d1_Num的单位[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]游戏初始时代必须设为%s1_Name或更早方可建造
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]游戏初始时代必须设为%s1_Name或更早方可建造
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Can only be Built on %s1_Name and Earlier Starts

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]每座城市只能建造%d1_Num座世界级奇观[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]每座城市只能建造%d1_Num座世界级奇观[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num World Wonders per City[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]每座城市只能建造%d1_Num座组队级奇观[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]每座城市只能建造%d1_Num座组队级奇观[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num Team Wonders per City[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]每座城市只能建造%d1_Num座国家级奇观[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]每座城市只能建造%d1_Num座国家级奇观[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Construct %d1_Num National Wonders per City[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: 建造速度加倍, 如拥有[LINK=literal]%s1_Bonus[\LINK]
TEXT.Chinese: 建造速度加倍, 如拥有[LINK=literal]%s1_Bonus[\LINK]

TEXT.English: 拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]的城市是文明的首都，其他城市维护费的高低由距离首都的远近决定。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]能产生文化和少量商业收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]的城市是文明的首都，其他城市维护费的高低由距离首都的远近决定。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]能产生文化和少量商业收入。
TEXT.French: The city containing the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace[COLOR_REVERT] is the capital of your civilization and city maintenance is decreased in cities near it. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace[COLOR_REVERT] generates culture and a small amount of commerce.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费；并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费；并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities; it also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]凡尔赛宫[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费，相当于第二座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]凡尔赛宫[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费，相当于第二座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities and acts like a second [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases the chances of creating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城墙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力。建造城墙可抵御敌国或蛮族的攻击。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城墙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力。建造城墙可抵御敌国或蛮族的攻击。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. Build them in cities under threat from enemy or barbarian assault.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力，并能积累少量文化值。可在边境城市建造。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力，并能积累少量文化值。可在边境城市建造。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] increase your city's defenses aganst pre-gunpowder units and generate a small amount of culture. Build them in cities near enemy civilizations.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵营[COLOR_REVERT]为所在城市组建的单位提供经验值。可在所有需要组建军事单位的城市建造。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]兵营[COLOR_REVERT]为所在城市组建的单位提供经验值。可在所有需要组建军事单位的城市建造。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to troops built in their cities. Build them in all cities that will produce military units.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]地堡[COLOR_REVERT]减少空中单位造成的破坏。可在敌方拥有强大空军时（或之前！）建造。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]地堡[COLOR_REVERT]减少空中单位造成的破坏。可在敌方拥有强大空军时（或之前！）建造。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bunkers[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from air attacks. Build them when (or before!) your enemies have strong air forces.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防空洞[COLOR_REVERT]减少核打击造成的破坏。应在重要的城市建造。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防空洞[COLOR_REVERT]减少核打击造成的破坏。应在重要的城市建造。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from nuclear attacks. These should be built in your most important cities.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]粮仓[COLOR_REVERT]储存食物，加速城市成长。在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小麦[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]资源的情况下可提升城市健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]粮仓[COLOR_REVERT]储存食物，加速城市成长。在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小麦[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]资源的情况下可提升城市健康度。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granaries[COLOR_REVERT] store food to help increase a city's growth rate. They add additional health if your civ has access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]奇观的前提。如希望城市进一步发展可建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，或在居民提出要求时再建造。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]奇观的前提。如希望城市进一步发展可建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，或在居民提出要求时再建造。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT] improves a city's health and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] wonder. Build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueducts[COLOR_REVERT] when you want to grow a city, or when the populace begins clamoring for it.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助单位恢复战斗力，并提升城市健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助单位恢复战斗力，并提升城市健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]医院[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] help units heal damage more quickly and add health to a city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]回收中心[COLOR_REVERT]可消除城市设施带来的污染，例如[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工场[COLOR_REVERT]，污染问题在大城市中相当严重。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]回收中心[COLOR_REVERT]可消除城市设施带来的污染，例如[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工场[COLOR_REVERT]，污染问题在大城市中相当严重。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Recycling Centers[COLOR_REVERT] eliminate pollution from city improvements like [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT], which can become a real problem in larger metropolises.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可提升水域的食物产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]奇观的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可提升水域的食物产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]奇观的前提。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] improves the food output of water plots. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] wonder.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市来自商路的收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛤蜊[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]螃蟹[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼群[COLOR_REVERT]资源还可提升城市健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]港口[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市来自商路的收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛤蜊[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]螃蟹[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼群[COLOR_REVERT]资源还可提升城市健康度。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT] increases that city's income from trade routes. It increases a city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]在你卷入海战时将非常有用。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]能更快地建造舰船，并提供额外经验点，但[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]在你卷入海战时将非常有用。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]能更快地建造舰船，并提供额外经验点，但[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]干船坞[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] are very useful when you are involved in naval warfare. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] build ships much faster and the ships start off with additional experience points, but [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness in cities.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市商路增加，拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]的城市可空运单位。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市商路增加，拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]的城市可空运单位。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] add an additional trade route, and a city with an [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airport[COLOR_REVERT] can airlift one unit per turn to any of your other cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness in cities.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的生产能力，但也会影响城市健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的生产能力，但也会影响城市健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]煅造场[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]世界奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT] allows a city to produce units and buildings faster, but also adds unhealthiness in cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市生产力，但会显著影响健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火电站[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]，或[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]的前提，在拥有相应资源的情况下能提升生产力。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市生产力，但会显著影响健康度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火电站[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]，或[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]的前提，在拥有相应资源的情况下能提升生产力。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production at the cost of adding significant unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT], which add additional production with the proper resources.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火电站[COLOR_REVERT]为工厂提供电力，但其造成的污染会影响城市健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火电站[COLOR_REVERT]为工厂提供电力，但其造成的污染会影响城市健康度。
TEXT.French: Coal Plants provide power for the Factory, although the pollution will hurt your city's health.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]为[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供电力，且不会造成污染。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水电站[COLOR_REVERT]为[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供电力，且不会造成污染。

TEXT.English: 在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铀[COLOR_REVERT]的情况下，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]可为[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供电力。
TEXT.Chinese: 在拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铀[COLOR_REVERT]的情况下，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]核电站[COLOR_REVERT]可为[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]提供电力。
TEXT.French: With access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide power for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]可产生少量文化值，是早期扩展城市边界的有效方法。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]可产生少量文化值，是早期扩展城市边界的有效方法。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisks[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture, and are a good way to expand city borders early on.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]科学院[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的科研能力以及文化产出。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]科学院[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的科研能力以及文化产出。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academies[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research as well as its cultural output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]促进城市的科研并提供文化产出。是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]民族史诗[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]促进城市的科研并提供文化产出。是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]奇观，以及[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]民族史诗[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] boost your cities' research and provide culture. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] wonder, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] national wonders.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的科研能力并产生文化值。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的科研能力并产生文化值。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大学[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's research and provides culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oxford University[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天文台[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市科研能力。是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天文台[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市科研能力。是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatory[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's scientific research. It is required to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的科研能力及太空飞船建造能力，但也会影响健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市的科研能力及太空飞船建造能力，但也会影响健康度。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research and its spaceship production, but also add unhealthiness.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市文化值，并可通过文化滑杆调整快乐度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]也是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]环球剧场[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市文化值，并可通过文化滑杆调整快乐度。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]也是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]环球剧场[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's culture and increases the happiness output from using the culture slider. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] also provides culture and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Globe Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市快乐度，并可提升通过文化滑杆调整快乐度的能力。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市快乐度，并可提升通过文化滑杆调整快乐度的能力。
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's happiness and its happiness output from using the culture slider.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市文化产出。并可提升通过文化滑杆调整快乐度的能力。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市文化产出。并可提升通过文化滑杆调整快乐度的能力。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Towers[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output. They also increases the happiness output from using the culture slider.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商业收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]毛皮[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丝绸[COLOR_REVERT]，或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鲸鱼[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市快乐度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]市场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商业收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]毛皮[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丝绸[COLOR_REVERT]，或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鲸鱼[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市快乐度。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]杂货店[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商业收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香料[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]食糖[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]酒类[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香蕉[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]杂货店[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商业收入。如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香料[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]食糖[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]酒类[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]香蕉[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市健康度。
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocer[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's wealth. It also increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市商业收入。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]华尔街[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市商业收入。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银行[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]华尔街[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。
TEXT.French: A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's production of wealth. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wall Street[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]超级市场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]野鹿[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牛群[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]家猪[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]绵羊[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升其效果。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]超级市场[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，如拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]野鹿[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牛群[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]家猪[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]绵羊[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升其效果。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT] increase the health of cities, if the cities have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]降低城市维护费，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助维持广阔的帝国。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]降低城市维护费，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助维持广阔的帝国。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs and are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] help manage the cost of controlling large empires.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]减少城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]厌战情绪[COLOR_REVERT]。可在要卷入长期战争时，或在市民提出要求时建造。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]减少城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]厌战情绪[COLOR_REVERT]。可在要卷入长期战争时，或在市民提出要求时建造。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT]. Build them if you are involved in a long war and your citizens are starting to complain.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教会堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]为官方信仰）。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教会堂[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]为官方信仰）。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Synagogue[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]所罗门圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]所罗门圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]犹太教圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Christian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Christianity[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).

TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stupa[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大菩提寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大菩提寺[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]佛教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。

TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]书院[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]书院[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Academy[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]孔庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]孔庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]儒学圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kong Miao[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]寺庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市的快乐度和文化值。在游戏早期是扩展文明边界的有效方法。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temples[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and culture. They are especially useful for expanding your civilization's borders during the early game.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]修道院[COLOR_REVERT]允许你组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]，用于向其他城市传播信仰。并能提供文化产出，并对科研有少量促进作用。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread the faith in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道宫[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道宫[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道教大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]）可大大提升城市的文化产出。能使市民更快乐（如果[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]是官方信仰）。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Pagoda[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It makes a city's citizens happy (if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] is the state religion).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]岱庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]岱庙[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]道教圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]）每回合可从每座信仰[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市获得一个金币。并能向世界传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dai Miao[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]使城市组建军事单位的速度加倍。如果你经常卷入战争则会非常需要。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英雄史诗[COLOR_REVERT]使城市组建军事单位的速度加倍。如果你经常卷入战争则会非常需要。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heroic Epic[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's production when creating military units. This is useful if you expect to do a lot of fighting. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]民族史诗[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]民族史诗[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升城市产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Epic[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the rate at which its city produces [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT], particularly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]环球剧场[COLOR_REVERT]可消除所在城市的所有不满。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]环球剧场[COLOR_REVERT]可消除所在城市的所有不满。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Globe Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] removes all unhappiness from the city in which it is built. It increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]冬宫[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市的文化产出加倍，并提升其产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]冬宫[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市的文化产出加倍，并提升其产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hermitage[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's cultural output and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升所在城市的科研能力。并允许你供养三位科学家，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升所在城市的科研能力。并允许你供养三位科学家，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oxford University[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also allows you to change three citizens into scientists and increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]华尔街[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市的商业收入加倍，并提升其产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]华尔街[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市的商业收入加倍，并提升其产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wall Street[COLOR_REVERT] doubles its city's production of wealth and increases its chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市生产能力（如果城市拥有煤炭或铁），但也会影响健康度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大铁厂[COLOR_REVERT]可提升城市生产能力（如果城市拥有煤炭或铁），但也会影响健康度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's production if that city has access to coal and/or iron, but also add unhealthiness. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 在拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西点军校[COLOR_REVERT]的城市组建的军事单位拥有四个初始经验点。此外，该城市有更大的几率产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: 在拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西点军校[COLOR_REVERT]的城市组建的军事单位拥有四个初始经验点。此外，该城市有更大的几率产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: All military units built in [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point's[COLOR_REVERT] city begin with four additional experience points. Further, its city is more likely to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]可减少所有本国城市的厌战情绪，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]可减少所有本国城市的厌战情绪，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mount Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市组建的单位获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]医疗一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]红十字会[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市组建的单位获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]医疗一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross[COLOR_REVERT] gives all units built in its city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, and it increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]苏格兰场[COLOR_REVERT]允许你训练[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍[COLOR_REVERT]单位，适用于探查敌方城市和领土。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]苏格兰场[COLOR_REVERT]允许你训练[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍[COLOR_REVERT]单位，适用于探查敌方城市和领土。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Scotland Yard[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to train the special [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spy[COLOR_REVERT] unit, which is good for scouting out enemy cities and territory. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大金字塔[COLOR_REVERT]允许你实行任何[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政府体制[COLOR_REVERT]类政策法令（大大增加游戏早期的政策选择）。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大金字塔[COLOR_REVERT]允许你实行任何[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政府体制[COLOR_REVERT]类政策法令（大大增加游戏早期的政策选择）。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] enable you to access all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Government[COLOR_REVERT] civics (greatly increasing your early management options). They also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巨石阵[COLOR_REVERT]可免费为你的所有城市提供一座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巨石阵[COLOR_REVERT]可免费为你的所有城市提供一座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]方尖碑[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stonehenge[COLOR_REVERT] provides a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT] in all your cities and centers the world map. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]可使所在城市免费供养两位科学家，提升城市的科研能力。并能大大提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]可使所在城市免费供养两位科学家，提升城市的科研能力。并能大大提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free scientist specialists, increasing the city's scientific output. It greatly increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有海滨城市额外增加两条商路。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有海滨城市额外增加两条商路。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] adds two additional trade routes to all coastal cities. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，并额外增加一个人口点数。还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，并额外增加一个人口点数。还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] improves the health of your cities and adds an additional population point in them. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]可使本国海滨城市的水域额外增加一个单位的商业产出。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]可使本国海滨城市的水域额外增加一个单位的商业产出。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all water tiles in your coastal cities. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神谕宣示所[COLOR_REVERT]可使建造者免费获得两项科技，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神谕宣示所[COLOR_REVERT]可使建造者免费获得两项科技，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] gives the builder one free technology advance, and it increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]帕特农神殿[COLOR_REVERT]可提升你的文明产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。并可大量增加文化产出。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]帕特农神殿[COLOR_REVERT]可提升你的文明产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。并可大量增加文化产出。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate at which your civilization generates [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT], particularly [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT]. It also has a high cultural value.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吴哥窟[COLOR_REVERT]允许所在城市供养三位神学家。此外还可促进本国所有神学家的作用。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吴哥窟[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吴哥窟[COLOR_REVERT]允许所在城市供养三位神学家。此外还可促进本国所有神学家的作用。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]吴哥窟[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Angkor Wat[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to turn 3 citizens into priests in the city that builds the wonder. Further, it adds additional production to all of your priest specialists. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Angkor Wat[COLOR_REVERT] increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚[COLOR_REVERT]可使你的工人效率更高，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚[COLOR_REVERT]可使你的工人效率更高，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] causes your workers to build improvements much faster, and it increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]奇琴伊察[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市的防御能力+25%%。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]奇琴伊察[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市的防御能力+25%%。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chichen Itza[COLOR_REVERT] increases all cities' defenses by 25%%. It improves the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophets[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]使城市中的每位专业人员都能提供文化产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]具有极高的文化值，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]使城市中的每位专业人员都能提供文化产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]具有极高的文化值，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] causes each specialist in every city to generate culture. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] has a very high cultural value, and it increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 如果你设定了国教，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]螺旋尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可使所有宗教建筑产生金钱收入。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你设定了国教，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]螺旋尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可使所有宗教建筑产生金钱收入。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: If you have a state religion, the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT] causes all of that religion's buildings to generate gold for your civilizatiion. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣母院[COLOR_REVERT]提升同一大陆所有城市的快乐度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣母院[COLOR_REVERT]提升同一大陆所有城市的快乐度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT] increases the happiness of all of your cities built on the same continent. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]泰姬陵[COLOR_REVERT]可立即触发本文明的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金时代[COLOR_REVERT]。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]泰姬陵[COLOR_REVERT]可立即触发本文明的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金时代[COLOR_REVERT]。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: Building the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] begins an immediate [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]可减少加速生产的花费并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]可减少加速生产的花费并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kremlin[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the cost of hurrying production and it increases its city's chances of generating [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineers[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] puts a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Tower[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. Its city has an improved chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得一位专业人员。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得一位专业人员。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]百老汇[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门音乐剧[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]百老汇[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门音乐剧[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadway[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Musicals[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摇滚名人堂[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门单曲[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摇滚名人堂[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门单曲[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rock-n-Roll[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will create a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]好莱坞[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]卖座电影[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]好莱坞[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]卖座电影[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT] provides your civilization with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三峡大坝[COLOR_REVERT]可为同一大陆的所有城市提供无污染的电力，用于提升[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]的生产能力。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三峡大坝[COLOR_REVERT]可为同一大陆的所有城市提供无污染的电力，用于提升[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工厂[COLOR_REVERT]的生产能力。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Three Gorges Dam[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent, which is needed to increase the production of the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 一旦建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]，你所有新组建的单位将获得两个初始经验点。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: 一旦建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]，你所有新组建的单位将获得两个初始经验点。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: Once the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] is built, all new units built in your civilization receive two experience points. Its city is more likely to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合国[COLOR_REVERT]用于进行触发[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]外交胜利[COLOR_REVERT]的选举。可确保你作为此项选举的候选者之一，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合国[COLOR_REVERT]用于进行触发[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]外交胜利[COLOR_REVERT]的选举。可确保你作为此项选举的候选者之一，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天梯[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市建造太空飞船组件的速度+50%%，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天梯[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市建造太空飞船组件的速度+50%%，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship part production in all of your cities by 50%%, and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 一旦建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]，你所有新组建的单位将获得两个初始经验点。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: 一旦建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]，你所有新组建的单位将获得两个初始经验点。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: Once the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] is built, all new units built in your civilization receive two experience points and increases the chance that its city more likely to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费；并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费；并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities; it also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]可减少加速生产的花费并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]可减少加速生产的花费并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kremlin[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the cost of hurrying production and it increases its city's chances of generating [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spies[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 在拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西点军校[COLOR_REVERT]的城市组建的军事单位拥有四个初始经验点。此外，该城市有更大的几率产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: 在拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西点军校[COLOR_REVERT]的城市组建的军事单位拥有四个初始经验点。此外，该城市有更大的几率产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: All military units built in a city with a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]West Point[COLOR_REVERT] building begin with four additional experience points. Further, its city is more likely to generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]降低城市维护费，增加谍报点数产出，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提.[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助维持广阔的帝国。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]降低城市维护费，增加谍报点数产出，并是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]国家奇观的前提.[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]可帮助维持广阔的帝国。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs, provide you with a bonus to espionage and are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] help manage the cost of controlling large empires.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力，增加谍报点数产出，并能积累少量文化值。可在边境城市建造。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市对火器时代以前单位的防御能力，增加谍报点数产出，并能积累少量文化值。可在边境城市建造。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] increase your city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units, increase espionage output and generate a small amount of culture. Build them in cities near enemy civilizations.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]减少城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]厌战情绪[COLOR_REVERT]，并增加谍报点数产出。可在要卷入长期战争时，或在市民提出要求时建造。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]监狱[COLOR_REVERT]减少城市的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]厌战情绪[COLOR_REVERT]，并增加谍报点数产出。可在要卷入长期战争时，或在市民提出要求时建造。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT] and increase espionage significantly. Build them if you are involved in a long war and your citizens are starting to complain.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]使城市中的每位专业人员都能提供文化产出，并增加宗教建筑的文化产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]具有极高的文化值，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]使城市中的每位专业人员都能提供文化产出，并增加宗教建筑的文化产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]具有极高的文化值，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] causes each specialist in every city to generate culture and increases the culture bonus provided by religious buildings. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] has a very high cultural value, and it increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市商路增加，使城市新建空军单位获得经验奖励，并提升城市可容纳空军单位数量。拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]的城市每回合可空运一个单位到其他城市，空军单位容纳数量+4（总计为8）。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]可使城市商路增加，使城市新建空军单位获得经验奖励，并提升城市可容纳空军单位数量。拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]的城市每回合可空运一个单位到其他城市，空军单位容纳数量+4（总计为8）。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]机场[COLOR_REVERT]也会影响城市健康度。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] add an additional trade route, provide an experience bonus to all Air Units and increase the number of Air Units you may house in a city. A city with an [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airport[COLOR_REVERT] can also airlift one unit per turn to any of your other cities and house four extra Air Units for a total of eight. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness in cities.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]议会厅[COLOR_REVERT]为神圣罗马的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]，可使城市维护费大幅减少。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]议会厅[COLOR_REVERT]为神圣罗马的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]，可使城市维护费大幅减少。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rathaus[COLOR_REVERT], the Holy Roman replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], greatly reduces maintenance in your cities.

TEXT.English: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防洪堤[COLOR_REVERT]可使沿河地块额外增加1单位产能。
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防洪堤[COLOR_REVERT]可使沿河地块额外增加1单位产能。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levee[COLOR_REVERT] to receive a bonus production from river tiles.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海堤[COLOR_REVERT]为荷兰的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防洪堤[COLOR_REVERT]，除可提升沿河地块产能之外，还可使有市民工作的水域额外增加1单位产能。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海堤[COLOR_REVERT]为荷兰的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]防洪堤[COLOR_REVERT]，除可提升沿河地块产能之外，还可使有市民工作的水域额外增加1单位产能。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dike[COLOR_REVERT], the Dutch replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levee[COLOR_REVERT], provides a production bonus from all water tiles worked by a city, in addition to river tiles.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人祭球场[COLOR_REVERT]为玛雅的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]，可为所在城市提供3个快乐点数而非后者的1个。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人祭球场[COLOR_REVERT]为玛雅的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]，可为所在城市提供3个快乐点数而非后者的1个。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ball Court[COLOR_REVERT], the Mayan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT], to provide cities with three happiness instead of one.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念石柱[COLOR_REVERT]为埃塞俄比亚的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，可使所在城市文化产出大幅增加。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念石柱[COLOR_REVERT]为埃塞俄比亚的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，可使所在城市文化产出大幅增加。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], provides a major bonus to Culture output in your city.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]花园[COLOR_REVERT]为巴比伦的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]，除快乐点数加成之外还额外提供2个健康点数。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]花园[COLOR_REVERT]为巴比伦的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]竞技场[COLOR_REVERT]，除快乐点数加成之外还额外提供2个健康点数。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Garden[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colosseum[COLOR_REVERT], provides two bonus health in addition to the usual happiness bonus.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神塔[COLOR_REVERT]为苏美尔特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]，相比后者建造所需产能较少。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神塔[COLOR_REVERT]为苏美尔特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法庭[COLOR_REVERT]，相比后者建造所需产能较少。
TEXT.French: Constructing the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziggurat[COLOR_REVERT], the Sumerian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], requires fewer hammers than its generic counterpart.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图腾柱[COLOR_REVERT]为北美土著的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，除增加文化积累外，还可使所有投射单位增加3点经验值。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]图腾柱[COLOR_REVERT]为北美土著的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，除增加文化积累外，还可使所有投射单位增加3点经验值。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Totem Pole[COLOR_REVERT], the Native American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], grants archery units three bonus experience in addition to the usual culture bonus.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]赛马场[COLOR_REVERT]为拜占庭的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]，提供1单位快乐值，如有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马匹[COLOR_REVERT]可再增加1单位快乐，如财政预算中文化支出达到特定比例还可额外增加快乐值。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]赛马场[COLOR_REVERT]为拜占庭的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]剧场[COLOR_REVERT]，提供1单位快乐值，如有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马匹[COLOR_REVERT]可再增加1单位快乐，如财政预算中文化支出达到特定比例还可额外增加快乐值。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hippodrome[COLOR_REVERT], the Byzantine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], provides a bonus to happiness, an extra happiness for access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT] and an increased happiness bonus from money dedicated to your cultural slider.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海关[COLOR_REVERT]可提升外贸商路的收益。配合[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]自由市场[COLOR_REVERT]国策可充分发挥作用。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海关[COLOR_REVERT]可提升外贸商路的收益。配合[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]自由市场[COLOR_REVERT]国策可充分发挥作用。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT] increases the commerce generated by a city's Foreign Trade Routes. Consider using it in conjunction with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Free Market[COLOR_REVERT] Civic.

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工业园区[COLOR_REVERT]允许增加两位工程师，再免费供养一位工程师。其代价是增加城市的疾病值。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]工业园区[COLOR_REVERT]允许增加两位工程师，再免费供养一位工程师。其代价是增加城市的疾病值。
TEXT.French: An [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Park[COLOR_REVERT] allows the addition of two Engineer specialists to your city, with an extra free Engineer thrown in for good measure. This comes at a significant cost to your city's health.

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家公园[COLOR_REVERT]可消除所在城市因人口规模导致的疾病点数。所在城市范围内的每块[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]森林保护区[COLOR_REVERT]可免费供养一位专业人员，并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]国家公园[COLOR_REVERT]可消除所在城市因人口规模导致的疾病点数。所在城市范围内的每块[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]森林保护区[COLOR_REVERT]可免费供养一位专业人员，并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Park[COLOR_REVERT] to eliminate all unhealthiness from population in your city. It also provides a free specialist for each [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserve[COLOR_REVERT] in its city radius and increases the chances that a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] might appear in your city.

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]情报局[COLOR_REVERT]可增加城市谍报点数。并允许增加两位间谍类专业人员。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]情报局[COLOR_REVERT]可增加城市谍报点数。并允许增加两位间谍类专业人员。
TEXT.French: Build an [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Intelligence Agency[COLOR_REVERT] to increase the espionage points created by your city. It also allows for the creation of two Spy specialists.

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]安全局[COLOR_REVERT]可提升敌方在你的城市实施间谍行动所需的花费。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]安全局[COLOR_REVERT]可提升敌方在你的城市实施间谍行动所需的花费。
TEXT.French: Build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Security Bureau[COLOR_REVERT] to increase the cost of enemy espionage missions in your city.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摩艾石像群[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市的每片水域额外增加1单位产能。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摩艾石像群[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市的每片水域额外增加1单位产能。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Moai Statues[COLOR_REVERT] add a bonus production to every water tile in the city in which it's constructed. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摩索拉斯陵墓[COLOR_REVERT]可使黄金时代持续时间延长百分之五十。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摩索拉斯陵墓[COLOR_REVERT]可使黄金时代持续时间延长百分之五十。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum of Maussollos[COLOR_REVERT] increases its builder's Golden Ages by fifty percent. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宙斯神像[COLOR_REVERT]增加敌国家民众的厌战情绪。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宙斯神像[COLOR_REVERT]增加敌国家民众的厌战情绪。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] increases war weariness in the cities of those who go to war against its builder. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瑞光大金塔[COLOR_REVERT]可对所在文明启用所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]宗教信仰[COLOR_REVERT]类内政法令，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瑞光大金塔[COLOR_REVERT]可对所在文明启用所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]宗教信仰[COLOR_REVERT]类内政法令，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shwedagon Paya[COLOR_REVERT] grants its builder access to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religious[COLOR_REVERT] Civics. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教皇宫[COLOR_REVERT]将触发[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]外交[COLOR_REVERT]投票选举，建造者将确定为候选人之一，教皇宫还能提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]教皇宫[COLOR_REVERT]将触发[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]外交[COLOR_REVERT]投票选举，建造者将确定为候选人之一，教皇宫还能提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apostolic Palace[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]耶稣巨像[COLOR_REVERT]允许每回合改变一次[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]官方信仰[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]内政法令[COLOR_REVERT]，并不会导致无政府状态，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]耶稣巨像[COLOR_REVERT]允许每回合改变一次[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]官方信仰[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]内政法令[COLOR_REVERT]，并不会导致无政府状态，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT] allows its builder to switch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religions[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Civics[COLOR_REVERT] instantly once per turn, with no anarchy. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]苏格兰场[COLOR_REVERT]可使谍报点数产出+100%%。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]苏格兰场[COLOR_REVERT]可使谍报点数产出+100%%。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Scotland Yard[COLOR_REVERT] provides a +100%% bonus to Espionage output.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]不经历无政府状态[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]减少改变内政法令或官方信仰间隔时间
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]不经历无政府状态[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]减少改变内政法令或官方信仰间隔时间
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]No Anarchy[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Minimal wait between Civics or State Religion changes

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]改变内政法令或官方信仰间隔时间%D1%%
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]改变内政法令或官方信仰间隔时间%D1%%
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% wait between Civics or State Religion changes

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]公交系统[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，如有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]再额外增加健康，如实行[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]绿色经济[COLOR_REVERT]再额外增加健康度。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]公交系统[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市健康度，如有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]再额外增加健康，如实行[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]绿色经济[COLOR_REVERT]再额外增加健康度。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Public Transportation[COLOR_REVERT] provides a bonus to health in your city and an added bonus for access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] or when under [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Environmentalism[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]谷物研磨公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]谷物研磨公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小麦[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]谷物研磨公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市增加食物产出，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]谷物研磨公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]谷物研磨公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]小麦[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]谷物研磨公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市增加食物产出，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cereal Mills[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cereal Mills Corporation[COLOR_REVERT], which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wheat[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT] and adds a food bonus to cities where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cereal Mills Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Cereal Mills franchise.

TEXT.English: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]席德寿司公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]席德寿司公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛤蜊[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼群[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]螃蟹[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]席德寿司公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市增加食物和文化产出，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]席德寿司公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]席德寿司公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛤蜊[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]鱼群[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]螃蟹[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]席德寿司公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市增加食物和文化产出，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sid's Sushi Company[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sid's Sushi Corporation[COLOR_REVERT], which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clams[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crabs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT] and adds bonus food and culture to cities where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sid's Sushi Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Sid's Sushi franchise.

TEXT.English: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]标准乙醇公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]标准乙醇公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]食糖[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]，使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]标准乙醇公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市增加科研点数，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]标准乙醇公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]标准乙醇公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]玉米[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]食糖[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]稻米[COLOR_REVERT]提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]石油[COLOR_REVERT]，使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]标准乙醇公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市增加科研点数，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Standard Ethanol[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standard Ethanol Corporation[COLOR_REVERT], which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Corn[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rice[COLOR_REVERT] and adds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT] and a research bonus to every city where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Standard Ethanol Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Standard Ethanol franchise.

TEXT.English: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]创新建筑公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]创新建筑公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]花岗石[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]大理石[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]创新建筑公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市获得产能和文化加成，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]创新建筑公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]创新建筑公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]花岗石[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]大理石[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]创新建筑公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市获得产能和文化加成，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Creative Constructions[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Creative Constructions Corporation[COLOR_REVERT], which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marble[COLOR_REVERT] and adds a production and culture bonus to every city where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Creative Constructions Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Creative Constructions franchise.

TEXT.English: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合矿业公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]联合矿业公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]煤炭[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]白银[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]联合矿业公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市获得产能加成，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合矿业公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]联合矿业公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]煤炭[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]白银[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]联合矿业公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市获得产能加成，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mining Inc[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mining Inc Corporation[COLOR_REVERT], which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminum[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silver[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT] and adds a production bonus to any city where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mining Inc Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Mining Inc. franchise.

TEXT.English: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]综合制铝公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]综合制铝公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]煤炭[COLOR_REVERT]提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铝[COLOR_REVERT]，并使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]综合制铝公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市增加科研点数，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]综合制铝公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]综合制铝公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]煤炭[COLOR_REVERT]提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铝[COLOR_REVERT]，并使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]综合制铝公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市增加科研点数，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aluminum Co.[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminum Co. Corporation[COLOR_REVERT], which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT] and adds [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminum[COLOR_REVERT] and a research bonus to every city where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminum Co. Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with an Alunimum Co. franchise.

TEXT.English: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]文明珠宝公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]文明珠宝公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]白银[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]宝石[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]文明珠宝公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市获得商业和文化加成，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.Chinese: 建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]文明珠宝公司[COLOR_REVERT]总部将创立[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]文明珠宝公司[COLOR_REVERT]，使用[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]白银[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]宝石[COLOR_REVERT]使拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]文明珠宝公司[COLOR_REVERT]业务分支的城市获得商业和文化加成，并为总部所在城市带来额外金钱收入。
TEXT.French: Build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civilized Jewelers Inc[COLOR_REVERT] Headquarters to create the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Civilized Jewelers Inc Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] which consumes [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silver[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gems[COLOR_REVERT] and adds gold and a culture bonus to every city where the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Civilized Jewelers Inc Corporation[COLOR_REVERT] is present. The Headquarters provide gold for each city in the world with a Civilized Jewelers franchise.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]可减少所有本国城市的厌战情绪，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]可减少所有本国城市的厌战情绪，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mount Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人工湖[COLOR_REVERT]为高棉特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，除提供健康加成外还额外提供食物奖励。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人工湖[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人工湖[COLOR_REVERT]为高棉特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]引水渠[COLOR_REVERT]，除提供健康加成外还额外提供食物奖励。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]人工湖[COLOR_REVERT]是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]的前提。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baray[COLOR_REVERT], the Khmer replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides a food bonus, in addition to the usual health bonus. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baray[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to construct [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]The Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]商站[COLOR_REVERT]是葡萄牙的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海关[COLOR_REVERT]，除正常的国际商路收益加成外，还可从每片城市水域额外获得一单位商业收入。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]商站[COLOR_REVERT]是葡萄牙的特色建筑，替代[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]海关[COLOR_REVERT]，除正常的国际商路收益加成外，还可从每片城市水域额外获得一单位商业收入。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Feitoria[COLOR_REVERT], the Portuguese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT], provides a commerce bonus from all water tiles worked by a city in addition to the usual foreign trade route bonus.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]防御能力增加%d1_Mod%% (仅对冷兵器类单位有效)

TEXT.English: [TAB]在德国的城镇中，议会厅是一种主要用于举行地方议会和开展其它官方活动的重要场所。它也曾被一些利益集团用作基于城镇政策而举行其他活动的大型会议场所。[PARAGRAPH:1]德国有几座著名的议会厅，这其中包括勋伯格议会厅。勋伯格议会厅建于1911年至1914年间，坐落于柏林市的一个名叫特培尔霍夫-勋伯格的自治镇，那时这个自治镇还没有被吸收进柏林市。二战之后，勋伯格议会厅还一度为西柏林政府提供临时席位。在柏林墙倒塌之后，这座建筑被重新恢复了它的原始职能，即成为了勋伯格区的市政大厅。
TEXT.Chinese: [TAB]在德国的城镇中，议会厅是一种主要用于举行地方议会和开展其它官方活动的重要场所。它也曾被一些利益集团用作基于城镇政策而举行其他活动的大型会议场所。[PARAGRAPH:1]德国有几座著名的议会厅，这其中包括勋伯格议会厅。勋伯格议会厅建于1911年至1914年间，坐落于柏林市的一个名叫特培尔霍夫-勋伯格的自治镇，那时这个自治镇还没有被吸收进柏林市。二战之后，勋伯格议会厅还一度为西柏林政府提供临时席位。在柏林墙倒塌之后，这座建筑被重新恢复了它的原始职能，即成为了勋伯格区的市政大厅。
TEXT.French: [TAB]In German towns and cities the Rathaus was a central location used primarily for town council meetings and other official business. It was also used as a large meeting space for interest groups as well as for other activities, depending on the town's policies.[PARAGRAPH:1]Germany has several famous rathauses, including the Rathaus Schöneberg. The Rathaus Schöneberg was built in the Berlin borough of Tempelhof-Schöneberg between 1911 and 1914 before Schöneberg was absorbed by Berlin. After World War II, the Rathaus Schöneberg served as the temporary seat of government for West Berlin. Upon the destruction of the Berlin wall in 1989 the Rathaus reverted once again to its original function as City Hall of Schöneberg.

TEXT.English: [TAB]最初人们都是沿着河岸来修筑河堤。然而每当大雨如注时，尼罗河，印度河，底格里斯河或扬子江对河两岸的人们来说都是个巨大的威胁。防洪堤，也称为大坝，是个由土或者岩石构筑而成的大墙，专门建来阻止洪水。古埃及人是最杰出的水利建筑师之一，凿渠令尼罗河水为城市供水和灌溉农作物。今天，大坝为世界各地的人们提供水电。
TEXT.Chinese: [TAB]最初人们都是沿着河岸来修筑河堤。然而每当大雨如注时，尼罗河，印度河，底格里斯河或扬子江对河两岸的人们来说都是个巨大的威胁。防洪堤，也称为大坝，是个由土或者岩石构筑而成的大墙，专门建来阻止洪水。古埃及人是最杰出的水利建筑师之一，凿渠令尼罗河水为城市供水和灌溉农作物。今天，大坝为世界各地的人们提供水电。
TEXT.French: [TAB]The earliest human civilizations all grew up along the banks of rivers. Yet when rains grew heavy, the Nile, Indus, Tigris or Yangtze became a danger to those on their shores. The Levee, also known as a dam, is a wall of earth or stone, constructed to hold back encroaching waters. The ancient Egyptians were among some of the most sophisticated levee builders, channeling the Nile in order to provide water for cities and crops. Today levees provide hydroelectric power to populations throughout the world.

TEXT.English: [TAB]海堤是石头或泥土筑成的长墙，用于引入或阻止水流。荷兰的许多国土实际上都处于海平面以下的位置，为了抵御海水泛滥，海堤成了这里的象征。大堤，当然首先是为了保证国家命脉的延续（还从对外国的纺织品进口依赖中独立出来），偶尔也被用在一条精明的自卫计策里。在八十年战争中期的莱顿围城战中，荷兰领袖威廉・奥兰治的部队打开了环城大堤的一角，大水淹没了西班牙敌军的阵地，从而在海上就将侵略者据之门外。
TEXT.Chinese: [TAB]海堤是石头或泥土筑成的长墙，用于引入或阻止水流。荷兰的许多国土实际上都处于海平面以下的位置，为了抵御海水泛滥，海堤成了这里的象征。大堤，当然首先是为了保证国家命脉的延续（还从对外国的纺织品进口依赖中独立出来），偶尔也被用在一条精明的自卫计策里。在八十年战争中期的莱顿围城战中，荷兰领袖威廉・奥兰治的部队打开了环城大堤的一角，大水淹没了西班牙敌军的阵地，从而在海上就将侵略者据之门外。
TEXT.French: [TAB]Dikes are walls of earth or stone, used to entrap or hold back water. Often built as a protection against flooding, the dike has come to characterize the Netherlands, with significant portions of the country actually lying below sea level. Dikes, while a necessity for the country's continued survival (and independence from foreign towel imports), were occasionally used as a clever tactic for self-defense. During the Siege of Leiden in the midst of the Eighty Years War, Dutch leader Willem van Oranje's men cut the dykes around the city, flooding the positions of the opposing Spanish and driving the invaders back before the sea.

TEXT.English: [TAB]中美洲土著的“球赛”（不是这项运动原始意义上的名字）起源于墨西哥南部，大约距今已有两千年历史。到西班牙人到达时，这种比赛已经风靡墨西哥、危地马拉和伯利兹等地，并且吸引了众多上层社会和基层民众的踊跃参与。[PARAGRAPH:1]这项运动的很多部分还不为人所知，已知的只是两队各两到四名队员，各占一方场地，需用手臂、臀部和腿部将一个胶制小球不落地的送入对方球门。怎样决出胜利一方无从知晓，但是失败者却将成为下一批献给众神的祭品。[PARAGRAPH:1]人祭球场对玛雅人来说有着至关重要的宗教意义。玛雅人的国王们经常从玛雅族圣经中汲取灵感，创造一个英雄对阵地下世界之神的比赛。国王一方的胜利会被认为是他的城市延续生存的预兆。
